title: Why can't people be happy?
body:
Nearing the start of this season, people were complaining that games were snowballing into avalanches becuase malphite has 2000 armour and takes 2 damage on hit.

fine,riot buffs damage, not toning down tanks who already lose their picks to good kiting adcs.

Then people complain games were ending too fast becuase people are doing too much damage.

and then Riot buffs tanks to make tank picks up in the boring lane a bit on their favor.

Gets on PBE and picks a full tank rammus top to test new armour.

gets called a %%%%%% and meta abusing piece of shit for playing a tank.

:sad:

replies.body:
"full tank rammus" "meta abuse"
They realize conq and ie are a thing right? or armor pen? or magic damage?

> [{quoted}](name=Dude766,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=l2FHejEN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-09T10:22:08.851+0000)
>
> "full tank rammus" "meta abuse"
> They realize conq and ie are a thing right? or armor pen? or magic damage?

I won a 1v2 against a riven and kindred, becuase I managed to mechanically outplay them, rivens exact words were:
(insert name here): lmao wtf rammus so op.
(insert name here): stop fucking abusing the meta lol
(insert name here): learn to have fun
I get a solo kill against her with half health, when she just came out of base.
(average riven main who cant land qs):thats it you meta abusing piece of shit, what the fuck are you doing with your life playing tanks? are you having fun?
ye.

_**proceeds to rammus in relaxed**_{{champion:33}} **ok**
I'm not happy because this game has been my "switch off all real life problems" solution for 4 years and they're making the game less and less fun to play

Believe it or not, you can fix a problem without creating 2 more.
But Riot loves piling up problems ad infinitum.
The snowball meta never got deleted though, buffing damage was meant to fix snowballing? what?
